page.title: 18MY FAMILY BY LISA CLARKSON
page.content: {My dad,Gordon,}is a joiner.He used to work in London for 2 weeks at a time & we only saw him at weekends,but my mam didn't like this,so he came back home to work.His hobbies are gardening & leek growing. {My mam,Elaine,}works in the nearby town as an office cleaner.Her hobbies are knitting & reading books. {My brother,Lee,}is 12 years old & he bosses me about.He goes to Scouts every Friday & his hobbies are writing computer games & drawing. {I am called Lisa,}& I am 10.I like swimming, knitting & reading.I would like to be a poetess,or maybe an author. {My sister,Nicola,}is 7.She likes writing stories,reading & drawing. {My sister Emma,}is 5.She is always telling tales of me to my mam.{My {sister,Amy,}is one.She's lovely.
